title: Diamond Dazzle Jhumka: A Timeless Telugu Treasure
features: Intricate openwork dome design (jali) studded with dazzling diamonds. Features a traditional 'Kundan' inspired setting around the diamonds. Delicate gold beads (gundlu) dangle from the base, enhancing the earring's movement and shimmer. The upper part with intricate openwork, resembles traditional temple jewellery.
colors: Warm yellow gold complemented by the dazzling white brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Can also be styled for a modern ethnic look.
description: A perfect blend of traditional South Indian design and modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds add an undeniable sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, this Jhumka is a timeless investment piece that can be passed down through generations. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune.
